thread.title: Ground News - Winter Storm Warning This Weekend
thread.title_full: Ground News - Winter Storm Warning This Weekend

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Winter Storm Warning This Weekend
text:
Summary by Ground News Snow levels will start between 6,000 to 7,000 feet this evening. Total snow accumulations will range from one to four feet. Travel could be very difficult to impossible from delays, snow-covered roads, and chain controls.Winds could gust as high as forty-five mph. Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
My Mother Lode Winter Storm Warning This Weekend The National Weather Service has issued a Winter Storm Warning for Yosemite National Park above 6,000 feet, from 5 PM this afternoon until 5 PM Sunday. Additionally, a Winter Storm Warning will also be in effect for the western slope of the northern Sierra Nevada, from 6 PM this evening until 8 AM Sunday. Heavy snow is forecast. Snow levels will start between 6,000 to 7,000 feet this evening, before lowering to 4,000 to 5,000 feet on Saturday…

54 minutes ago Read Full Article stern.de Independent: Bertelsmann Stiftung Rain, snow and storm this weekend in Saxony. With falling temperatures, rain and stormy gales, spring in Saxony shows its rather unfavorable side this weekend. According to the German Weather Service in Leipzig, it will be cloudy on Friday with maximum temperatures of 15 to 17 degrees mostly remaining dry. Only occasional rain or drizzle is forecast. In the uplands, temperatures of 11 to 14 degrees are expected. On Saturday morning, rain is expected to arrive from the northwest. In the hig…
